msContents.summary: Small manuscript for personal use, prayer, and recitation in praise of the child deity Pāṇḍuraṅga, a form of the Hindu deity Kṛṣṇa popular especially in Maharashtra. Consists primarily of mantras to Viṭhṭhala (another name for the same god) and Pāṇḍuraṅga. Presented as a dialogue between the legendary sages Vasiṣṭha and Nārada.
